result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon R Zylka

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Brandon R Zylka in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Brandon R Zylka.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing. Due to court congestion and the lateness of the hour, Court orders case adjourned, Branch 15.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Brandon R Zylka in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Brandon R Zylka.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a jury trial. State and Defense request to resolve the case with a plea and sentencing. Court vacates today's trial. Case adjourned.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant Brandon R Zylka in Court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Brandon R Zylka.  Attorney Navjot Singh Hira in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. Court addressed Motions in Limine, Witness Lists, and Jury Instructions. Court issued a Sequestration Order. No additional issues need to be addressed at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 15. Jury Trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed. Defense Motion in LImine
STATE'S Requested Jury Instructions, received and filed.
STATE'S Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Brandon R Zylka in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a Status Conference. Defense requests final pretrial and jury trial dates. State informs the court they are waiting on blood results from the lab.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Brandon R Zylka in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Brandon R Zylka appeared by video means with Attorney.  HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Defense in receipt of discovery and no offer and request time to review and discuss with the defendant. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19 This hearing will be be held in person.  Status conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Brandon R Zylka in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Brandon R Zylka in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Brandon R Zylka appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.  This hearing will be streamed Live through DACAST: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
